<ashbaker@wscc.com>, <dennis@wscc.com> Subject: REVISION - - LOAD AND RESOURCE ESTIMATES Most control areas have now reported the amount of load relief and generation increase that was experienced over the Peak period (17:00-18:00 PST) on December 12. The data I have received thus far are summarized in the following paragraphs. The approximate amount of load relief achieved due to conservation or curtailments over the Peak period on December 12 was 835 MWh. The approximate amount of generation increase due to extraordinary operations or purchases over the Peak period on December 12 was 786 MWh. A note of caution, these figures are very imprecise and were derived with a lot of guesswork. However, they should be within the ballpark of reality. Don Badley
